notes: Completed Supplement entity implementation per 22_API_CONTRACTS.md Section 5. All 209 tests passing. Entity fields verified against spec: id, clientId, profileId, name, form, customForm, dosageQuantity, dosageUnit, brand, notes, ingredients, schedules, startDate, endDate, isArchived, syncMetadata. Includes SupplementIngredient and SupplementSchedule nested types. Added 5 supplement-related enums to health_enums.dart. Next: Continue with other Phase 1 domain entities (FluidsEntry, SymptomLog, etc.).
